effect_entries.effect: Contains friend codes for up to 32 other players, as well as their sprite, gender, and basic statistics for those that have been seen on WFC.
effect_entries.short_effect: Use to record Friend Codes and check your own.

flavor_text_entries.text:
友達を　登録したり
遊んだことを　記録する
便利な　手帳。

A convenient notepad that is used to
register your Friends and friend codes
and keep a record of your gameplay.

Blocco appunti utile per registrare gli amici e
il loro codice amico e per tenere un resoconto
dell’esperienza di gioco.

Es el billete válido para embarcar en el
Ferry S.S. Aqua. Tiene dibujado un barco.

In diesem praktischen Buch kannst du die
Freundescodes deiner Freunde aufbewahren.

Un carnet bien pratique pour enregistrer vos amis,
les codes ami et des données de jeu.

친구를 등록하거나
친구와 놀았던 기록을 관리하는
편리한 수첩.

ともだちを　とうろくしたり
あそんだ　ことを　きろくする
べんりな　てちょう。

A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends, Friend Codes,
and keeping a record of game play.

enregistrer vos amis, les codes
ami et des données de jeu.
